pkgmetadata.longdescription: # autoscrubautoscrub is a command line tool that automates the production of educational videos by increasing the playback speed during silent segments.## DocumentationDocumentation, along with installation instructions, are available at [http://autoscrub.readthedocs.io/](http://autoscrub.readthedocs.io/)## Licenceautoscrub is licensed under the GPLv3 licence.## ContributingPlease see [contributing.md](https://github.org/philipstarkey/autoscrub/src/tip/contributing.md)
